description: Unit: ISlaBackend interface has all required method signatures
Unit: SlaBackendFactory returns PgBossSlaBackend when isEnterprise is false
Unit: SlaBackendFactory returns TemporalSlaBackend when isEnterprise is true and Temporal available
Unit: SlaBackendFactory falls back to PgBossSlaBackend when Temporal unavailable in EE
Unit: PgBossSlaBackend.startSlaTracking() returns without error
Unit: PgBossSlaBackend.pauseSla() calls slaPauseService.pauseSla()
Unit: PgBossSlaBackend.resumeSla() calls slaPauseService.resumeSla()
Unit: PgBossSlaBackend.completeSla('response') calls slaService.recordFirstResponse()
Unit: PgBossSlaBackend.completeSla('resolution') calls slaService.recordResolution()
Unit: PgBossSlaBackend.cancelSla() returns without error
Unit: PgBossSlaBackend.getSlaStatus() delegates to slaService.getSlaStatus()
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow initializes with correct input parameters
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow initial state has currentPhase='response' and empty notifiedThresholds
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow calculates correct sleep duration for 50% threshold
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow calculates correct sleep duration for 75% threshold
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow calculates correct sleep duration for 90% threshold
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow calculates correct sleep duration for 100% threshold
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow pause signal sets pauseStartedAt timestamp
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow resume signal clears pauseStartedAt and increments totalPauseMinutes
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow resume signal recalculates next wake time with updated pause minutes
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow completeResponse signal transitions to resolution phase
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow completeResolution signal terminates workflow with success
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow cancel signal terminates workflow without breach
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow getState query returns current status and remaining time
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime returns correct wall-clock time for 8am-5pm Mon-Fri schedule
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime advances to Monday when start is Friday 4pm and target is 2 hours
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime skips holidays in calculation
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime handles recurring holidays correctly
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime subtracts pause minutes from elapsed time
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime returns immediate time for 24x7 schedule
Unit: sendSlaNotification activity calls slaNotificationService.sendSlaNotification()
Unit: checkAndEscalate activity calls escalationService.checkEscalationNeeded()
Unit: checkAndEscalate activity calls escalationService.escalateTicket() when threshold exceeded
Unit: updateSlaStatus activity updates ticket sla_response_met field
Unit: updateSlaStatus activity updates ticket sla_resolution_met field
Unit: recordSlaAuditLog activity inserts entry with correct event type
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.startSlaTracking() starts workflow with correct ID
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend workflow ID follows format sla-ticket-{tenantId}-{ticketId}
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.pauseSla() sends pause signal to workflow
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.resumeSla() sends resume signal to workflow
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.completeSla('response') sends completeResponse signal
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.completeSla('resolution') sends completeResolution signal
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.cancelSla() sends cancel signal to workflow
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.getSlaStatus() queries workflow state
Unit: slaService.startSlaForTicket() calls backend.startSlaTracking()
Unit: slaPauseService.pauseSla() calls backend.pauseSla()
Unit: slaPauseService.resumeSla() calls backend.resumeSla()
Unit: slaService.recordFirstResponse() calls backend.completeSla('response')
Unit: slaService.recordResolution() calls backend.completeSla('resolution')
Unit: TemporalSlaBackend.startSlaTracking() handles duplicate workflow ID without error
Unit: CE stub TemporalSlaBackend throws 'only available in Enterprise Edition'
Integration: New ticket in EE starts Temporal workflow
Integration: Workflow sends notification at 50% threshold
Integration: Workflow sends notification at 75% threshold
Integration: Workflow sends notification at 90% threshold
Integration: Workflow marks breach at 100% threshold
Integration: Workflow checks escalation at each threshold
Integration: Pausing ticket pauses workflow timer
Integration: Resuming ticket resumes workflow timer with adjusted time
Integration: First response transitions workflow to resolution phase
Integration: Resolution completes workflow
Integration: Ticket deletion cancels workflow
Integration: SLA policy change cancels old workflow and starts new one
Integration: New ticket in CE does not start Temporal workflow
Integration: CE sla-timer job continues to process tickets normally
Integration: Temporal worker loads SlaTicketWorkflow on startup
Integration: Temporal worker loads SLA activities on startup
E2E: Full ticket lifecycle in EE - create, 50% notification, pause, resume, first response, 50% resolution notification, resolve
E2E: Full ticket lifecycle in CE - create, poll-based 50% notification, pause, resume, first response, resolve
E2E: EE fallback to pgboss when Temporal unavailable
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime handles timezone correctly for America/New_York
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime handles timezone correctly for Europe/London
Unit: calculateNextWakeTime handles DST transition correctly
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow handles workflow replay correctly (deterministic)
Unit: SlaTicketWorkflow survives worker restart and continues from correct state
